attributes.action: MAKE IT ILLEGAL FOR PARENTS TO SEND MINORS WHO ARE BRITISH CITIZENS BACK HOME
attributes.additional_details: Ban parents from sending children abroad. To make it a form of child abuse to leave a child abroad in another country.
attributes.background: Ban parents from sending children who are British nationals abroad.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the safety of children when taken out of the UK, however it's not clear what actions would constitute 'sending children abroad' under your proposal.

You could have a petition calling on the Government to amend the Child Abduction Act to criminalise failure to return a child to UK, if that is something you'd like to see happen.

If you do choose to start a new petition, please be sure to include your full name, as petitions started using only a first name cannot be accepted.
